content.raw:
I think the only problem people will face is figuring out what dependencies are required. Installing ign-gui from a debian will be fine since the dependencies should be built in. When compiling from source, it would be great if cmake could error out if a dependency is missing. This might be hard to do since these are run-time dependencies. 

You could turn this into an issue that we can address later.
content.html:
I think the only problem people will face is figuring out what dependencies are required. Installing ign-gui from a debian will be fine since the dependencies should be built in. When compiling from source, it would be great if cmake could error out if a dependency is missing. This might be hard to do since these are run-time dependencies.

You could turn this into an issue that we can address later.
